name: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy
storyline: You have always dreamed of becoming a famous adventurer like your father. But reality is harsh and boring, and you spend your days doing menial jobs for the villagers. Then, together with his friends, he enters a tournament to become the top guild in the country. Will you be able to realize your ambitions? Or will your life be monotonous and monochrome?
summary:
Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy is
You are a guild member who has to work and protect your sister's life at home. The goal of the game is to solve your sister's disease or succeed as a guild member.
